attributes.action: The UK government must stop funding the World Health Organisation
attributes.additional_details:
The World Health Organisation (WHO) behaviour during the COVID-19 crisis appears to have been highly questionable and may have exacerbated the impact of the virus. This behaviour must be investigated to determine if this was the case and, if so, how to prevent it happening again.
To enforce this investigation, strong pressure must be applied to the WHO.
Stopping UK government funding of the WHO will help achieve this.
attributes.background: The UK government, one of the biggest financial contributors the the WHO, must stop funding the WHO at least until the WHO has been investigated regarding its behaviour during the COVID-19 crisis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314810.
